item.title: New grant support
item.description: This summer we’ve been fortunate to receive two major grants to support our research.

item.title: A new student joins the lab
item.description: Welcome to one new student, Brian Lee! See the Members page for more information on Brian’s work.

item.title: First graduate students join the lab
item.description: Welcome to four new graduate students: Marco Garcia Noceda, Zhenchen Hong, Yunxiao Li, and Yawei Qin. Read more about their work on the Members page!

item.title: Going to California
item.description: This winter I’ll be moving from MIT, which has been my home for the past 5 years, to start my own research group in the Department of Physics and Astronomy at the University of California, Riverside. It’s an exciting time, and I can’t wait to get started.
